fig.label: Figure 1

caption.p: Phase diagram for formulations containing PBS (AP), Brij 35 ® + soy phosphatidylcholine and grape seed oil (OP).

fig.attrib: Abbreviations: (S), grape seed oil (OP); AP, aqueous phase (PBS); S, surfactant (Brij 35 ®); OP, oil phase (grape seed oil); TLS, transparent liquid system; OLS, opaque liquid system; STLS, semi-transparent liquid system; PS, phase separation; TVS, transparent viscous system; OVS, opaque viscous system; STVS, semi-transparent viscous system.
